About Me

Senior Software Developer

Hello! My name is Kyle Kamperschroer and I am a software developer, currently employed by Microsoft as a senior engineering manager working with an incredible team on Azure Notification Hubs. My previous employers include SAP, Facet and Fons.

I obtained my Masters in Software Engineering and Bachelors of Computer Science both from the University of Wisconsin - La Crosse.

I am a passionate and hard working developer and I take a lot of pride in my craft. I am always looking for ways to learn and grow as a developer and a teammate.

If you wish to contact me, please use your preferred method below. Thanks for stopping by.

  • github.com/kylekampy
  • kyle@kampy.dev
  • linkedin.com/in/kylekamperschroer
